physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is square in shape and it features a military personnel and a large watercraft in the background. The military personnel is posing with his hands on his hips and looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. His shirt is tucked into his shorts and he adorns a military headgear and glasses. A watercraft with three funnels emitting smoke can be seen in the background at the left hand side of the photograph.
title_text: Military Personnel Posing with the RMS Empress of Australia (1919) at the background Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: military personnel ocean liners steamships transports (naval vessels)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Soldiers Empress of Australia (Steamship : 1922-1939) Transports
